It looks good and it sounds good and here it is beautifully illustrated... I will say no more...
These shirts are printed on the front and back. The line drawing on the back of the shirt with the filled illustration on to the front. The filled illustration is printed at 800 dpi.
All shirts in this series are designed in Adobe Illustrator by Yukio Miyamoto and are £
